title: The Lively art of picture books (TEFC)
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios and Joanna Foster
brief_description: Discusses the creation of picture books for children through interviews with artists Robert McCloskey, Barbara Cooney and Maurice Sendak. Shows examples of kinds of pictures used, various interpretations of the same subjects, and three complete picture books.
